text:
League 1
Monaco: Cesc Fabregas and Islam Slimani absent
This Sunday, the men of Leonardo Jardim moves to Geoffroy-Guichard in closing the 12th day of Ligue 1 with absentees in the ranks.
01 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Nils Constant



Kalifa Coulibaly (5.5 / 10) The Nantes striker put the ball on the post in the 51st minute. He still had a complicated game.



Ludovic Blas (6/10) A satisfying match for Ludovic Blas. He brought to his team by making 3 key passes.



Moses Simon (7/10) The best player in Nantes. He was in the oven and mill and did a lot of harm to MonegasquesIcon Sport



Charles Traor√© (5.5 / 10) The captain of Canaris made a satisfactory matchIcon Sport



Mehdi Abeid (5/10) A good first half. He was less visible in the second half and fished in the last move.



Kader Bamba (5) He was good in the first period and was less visible in the second half. He fished a bit in the last move and lost a lot of balloons (26 balls) .Icon Sport



Fabio (6/10) He made a good start to the match before going out on injury.Icon Sport



Nicolas Pallois (4.5 / 10) Not a very good performance from the defender of the Canaries. He got a cold on Ben Yedder's goal. He was a little better in the second halfIcon Sport



Andrei Girotto (4/10) He was in trouble every time Slimani had the ballIcon Sport



Dennis Appiah (5/10) He struggled every time Slimani had the ballIcon Sport



Alban Lafont (6/10) He did not have much to do and could not do anything about Ben YedderIcon Sport's goal



Christian GourcuffIcon Sport

Nantes - Monaco: the notes of the Canaries!




On a good run for some games, the Monegasques have qualified for the next round of the League Cup by defeating against Marseille Wednesday night (2-1). Beneficial match for some but not for others. Victim of a hamstring injury, Cesc Fabregas emerged grimacing in the 13th minute against the Phocaeans.




The number of injured swells




Monaco + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The list of players is increased in the infirmary of Monaco and the Portuguese technician is forced to play without Islam Slimani who suffers adductors. The absence of its two key players of the game Monegasque brings to six the number of players injured.

The case of Fabregas and Slimani does not fit the plans of Jardim who must win the match to bring the number of victories in a row in all competitions to four and stay on this great momentum.
